As of September 2025, I am a member of the Institute for Operations Research and the Management Sciences (INFORMS), Tau Beta Pi (engineering honor society), Society of Women Engineers (SWE), and Women in Defense (WID). The remainder of this page is dedicated to current and previous leadership positions.
